author: tocheng
body:
Base on the branch streamline-ALCARECO-trigger-bits_91X in fork cms-AlCaDB.
https://github.com/cms-AlCaDB/cmssw/tree/streamline-ALCARECO-trigger-bits_91X

This PR is to set up the consistency between keys of AlCaReco trigger bit in AlCaDB and AlCaReco name used in the sequence configuration files and AlCaReco matrix(autoAlCa.py).
For AlCaRecos that don't use trigger bit for event selection, a trigger bit is added to the tag in the database.
title: Streamline alcareco trigger bits
